actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs, S. Rept. 94-845.
Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to increase the authorization for certain small business loan programs.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to increase the authorization for loans for specified small business loan programs including: (1) displaced business disaster loans; (2) loans for the handicapped; (3) the small business investment company program; and (4) loans to State and local development companies. Increases the subceiling authorization for the program of making loans in urban or rural areas having high proportions of unemployed or low-income individuals or to businesses owned by low-income individuals.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to increase the authorization for certain small business loan programs.
